TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit BuildEventArgs extends System.EventArgs
Public MustInherit Class BuildEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class BuildEventArgs abstract : EventArgs

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> class is an abstract base class for all <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework> event argument classes.
## Examples The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events.
[!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks This implementation of the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs> constructor takes no parameters, and sets the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.Timestamp*> property to <xref:System.DateTime.Now%2A> and the <xref:Microsoft.Build.Framework.BuildEventArgs.ThreadId%2A> property to the current thread.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets location contextual information. This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.
Docs.value: A object representing the location contextual information.
